# ints

**Instance Property**

A cloned data column of integers.

## Declaration

```swift
var ints: MLDataColumn<Int>? { get }
```

## Return Value

A new data column if the underlying type of the column is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Int]; otherwise `nil`.

## Discussion

This property is functionally equivalent to passing [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Int]`.self` to [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLUntypedColumn/column(type:)]. Typically you ensure [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLUntypedColumn/type] is equal to [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataValue/ValueType/int] before getting this property.

## Exposing the underlying type to generate a data column

- **type**: The underlying type of the column.
- **doubles**: A cloned data column of doubles.
- **strings**: A cloned data column of strings.
- **sequences**: A cloned data column of machine learning sequences.
- **dictionaries**: A cloned data column of machine learning dictionaries.
- **multiArrays**: A cloned data column of machine learning multi-arrays.
- **column(type:)**: Clones the column to a data column of the given type.
